name: Mutiny in the Sky
text: Fusion Summon 1 Fiend or Fairy Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling Fiend and/or Fairy monsters from your GY into the Deck as material. If this card is in your GY: You can send 1 Fiend or Fairy monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY; add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Mutiny in the Sky" once per turn.
